entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn code generator referenced via a package flow is just convoluted #75268
    Backlog
  • EnC tests produce different results when using Windows and Portable PDB #75262

Closed

  • No completion for constructor parameter type when attribute is present #73120
    Backlog
  • IDE0304 should preserve the leading comment #74208
    Backlog
  • IDE0290 code fix is invalid in `ref struct` #73614
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Auto Complete Error with Collection Expressions #72872
    Backlog
  • IDE0028/IDE0300 is not reported for overloaded methods #73362
    Backlog
  • Refactoring IDE0053 with preprocessor directives breaks compilation #74137
    Backlog
  • Exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UseCollectionInitializer.CSharpUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #75214
  • NullRef in GenerateVariable.CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider.GetCodeActionsAsync #75204
    Backlog
  • WarningsAsErrors is not working #75198
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35325.131 #75248
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35325.230 #75247

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect more fluent cases for converting collection expressions #75267
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • update configs for snap #75263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for inlining declarations in top level code #75258
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Allow reordering members #75257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix crash when converting properties to methods #75256
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Fix issue simplifying name in speculative context #75255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix crash in encapsulate field with primary constructors #75254
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • docs: Fix in Contributing-Code.md .NET code formatter tool url #75253
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Do not load CodeStyle analyzers added by the SDK #75250
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix completion lists in primary constructor parameter lists #75266
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add telemetry to track the rename option used. #75269
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Preserve comment when converting to collection expression #75259
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prevent IDE0290 (convert to primary constructor) in ref struct #73869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Short term field keyword nullable analysis #75246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add test demonstrating a scenario now works #75265
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support converting to collection expression when overloads would not change #75264
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable use-expression-body for lambdas with PP directives in them #75261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.12 P3
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3

Updated

  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Stabilize lsp workspace diagnostic test #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
